title: Getting Started with Flask
body: Flask is a lightweight WSGI web application framework in Python. It’s easy to get started with and is perfect for small projects.

title: Integrating OpenAI API
body: You can use OpenAI’s GPT models to generate content by sending structured prompts to their API and processing the results in your application.

title: Understanding APScheduler
body: APScheduler is a Python library that lets you schedule jobs to run at specific times or intervals. Great for background tasks like data refreshes.

title: Working with Flask Blueprints
body: Flask Blueprints help you organize your application into reusable components. They're ideal for large apps with multiple modules.

title: Working with Flask Blueprints
body: Flask Blueprints help you organize your application into reusable components. They're ideal for large apps with multiple modules.
